conversations.content: John just send me an email about updating our github repository, could you follow his instructions.

<|Function_Thought|>
The user wants to follow instructions from an email sent by "John" regarding updating a GitHub repository. To do this, I need to first retrieve the received emails and identify the email from John. The `get_received_emails` tool is appropriate for this step. After getting the emails, I will need to parse the content of the email from John to understand the instructions.
<|/Function_Thought|>
